metadata.synopsis: Next time a player is spotted by S_LOW_VaultWaveservant, or commits a crime, in Offering's Vault, she'll call sahuagins for help.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Launch CTY_Main_A2. Get to Offerings Vault in the cellar and wait for a waveservant to arrive3. Try that againgoto -1821.478; 3.243; -74.007
